summary: 1999 DODGE GRAND CARAVAN STRUT TOWERS RUSTED SIGNIFICANTLY AND MAY BREAK.  PROBLEM OBVIOUSLY A MANUFACTURING DEFECT.  CHRYSLER SHOULD PAY FOR REPAIRS UNDER A RECALL PROGRAM.
